Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/63rd
ShortDescription: NB 4 Cottage Grove buses are temp. rerouted via Cottage Grove, 64th, Maryland, 63rd, Ellis, 61st & Cottage Grove due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 64th, Maryland, 63rd, Ellis, 61st and Cottage Grove due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/63rd..

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
